nl: All scientists who publish papers are researchers. Einstein published papers. Einstein was also a patent clerk. Was Einstein a researcher?
It is not the case that all birds fly. Penguins are birds. Can we conclude that penguins do not fly?
Socrates is a man. All men are mortal. What can we conclude about Socrates?
Before becoming president, Obama was a senator. All senators are politicians. Was Obama ever a politician?
If pigs could fly, then the sky would have pigs. Pigs cannot fly. Does the sky have pigs?
Every student passed some exam. John is a student. Did John pass an exam?
Water freezes at 0 degrees Celsius. The temperature is -5 degrees Celsius. Is the water frozen?
To graduate, students must complete coursework AND pass the final exam. Alice completed coursework but failed the final exam. Can Alice graduate?
Either the butler or the maid committed the crime. The butler has an alibi. Who committed the crime?
For every person, there exists someone who loves them. Does everyone have someone who loves them?
Cats are mammals, right? And mammals are warm-blooded. So cats must be warm-blooded, yeah?
It is not true that no students failed. Therefore, some students failed.
Alice is smarter than Bob. Bob is smarter than Carol. Is Alice smarter than Carol?
It is possible that it will rain tomorrow. It is possible that it will not rain tomorrow. Is the weather tomorrow uncertain?
The set of prime numbers includes 2, 3, 5, 7, and 11. Is 4 a prime number?
